info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of payment orders
info.title: Order Payment Orders APIs

get.description: Retrieves the details of a payment order

parameters.name: paymentOrderId
parameters.description: The unique reference number of payment

parameters.name: paymentStatus
parameters.description: Describes the current status of the payment order in the payment system

parameters.name: paymentOrderProductId
parameters.description: Reference to identify the payment details that are allowed, optional and mandatory are defined based on product

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Debit account unique id

parameters.name: orderingCustomerId
parameters.description: Debit Account customer id details

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: paymentOrderId
parameters.description: The unique reference number of payment

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.description: The unique reference number of payment

parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only

parameters.name: paymentDirection
parameters.description: Possible values of payment receiving and outgoing

parameters.name: endToEndReference
parameters.description: Reference details used for SEPA

parameters.name: debitCustomerId
parameters.description: Debtor customer id details

parameters.name: creditCustomerId
parameters.description: Creditor customer id details

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

narratives.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

additionalInformations.description: Additional Information provided to add context

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

remittanceInformations.description: Indicates the remittance information that is supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system, in an unstructured form.

remittanceInformation.description: Indicates the remittance information that is supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system, in an unstructured form.

signatories.description: The authorised signatories for the payments can be specified here. More applicable in case of corporate payments where multiple signatories are required to sign a payment instruction

signatory.description: The authorised signatories for the payments can be specified here. More applicable in case of corporate payments where multiple signatories are required to sign a payment instruction

invoiceReferences.description: It provides the reference of the invoice

invoiceReference.description: It provides the reference of the invoice

charges.description: The charges or fees for this transaction

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeName.description: The description of the charge to be taken for payment

chargeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency code of the charge account from where the fee is deducted

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

chargeAccountCurrencyAmount.description: Holds the charge to be applied for the corresponding charge type for the order in the currency of the charge account

overrides.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

beneficiaryAddresses.description: It provides the address of the payee

beneficiaryAddress.description: It provides the address of the payee

paymentOrderProductId.description: Indicates the payment order product for which payment is initiated

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

debitAccountIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the debtor account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

debitCurrency.description: Currency of the debit account. For example: USD, EUR etc.

debitValueDate.description: Date on which the amount will be debited for settlement

creditAccountId.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

creditAccountIBAN.description: Indicates the IBAN of the credit account

orderingCustomerId.description: Indicates the customer id for the ordering customer

orderingCustomerName.description: Indicates the name of Ordering Customer

executionDate.description: Date on which the transaction or payment gets processed, i.e. the processing date of the transaction.

treasuryRate.description: The Treasury rate for the conversion between payment currency and the ordering currency

forexSpread.description: The spread that is applied to the published internal exchange rates to derive the final exchange rate or the customer rate for the transaction for currency conversion between ordering currency and payment currency

forexCustomerRate.description: The exchange rate that is actually applied for currency conversion between ordering currency and payment currency in case of transactions involving FX conversion.

orderingPortfolio.description: Indicates the portfolio id for the debit side if the account belongs to a specific portfolio

creditPortfolio.description: Indicates the portfolio id for the credit side if the account belongs to a specific portfolio

orderingReference.description: The reference related to the ordering details

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

beneficiaryBIC.description: BIC (Bank Identifier Code) of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryName.description: Short title or short name of the beneficiary account account

accountWithBankBIC.description: This is the BIC code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

beneficiaryBankClearingCode.description: Clearing code or sort code of the beneficiary bank

accountWithBankClearingCode.description: This is the national clearing code or sort code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

clearingChannel.description: Indicates the clearing channel for the payment in the ISO format of the Clearing System Identifiers

structuredCreditorReference.description: Contains description of the credit account reference

beneficiaryCountryCode.description: Country code details for the beneficiary. Override may raise if the country not allowed

beneficiaryIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

accountWithBankIBAN.description: This is the IBAN of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

requiredCreditValueDate.description: The credit value date i.e. tentative date on which the payment system will process the payment

purpose.description: Purpose identifier of the payment or transaction, for SEPA payments in general.

structuredCommunicationCode.description: Creditor reference in a coded form i.e - RADM (RemittanceAdviceMessage) - RPIN (RelatedPaymentInstruction) - FXDR (ForeignExchangeDealReference) - DISP (DispatchAdvice) - PUOR (PurchaseOrder) - SCOR (StructuredCommunicationReference)

endToEndReference.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

instructionIdReference.description: Indicates the SEPA purpose of the SEPA Payment

termsAndConditions.description: Specifies the terms and conditions in the text format for the payment instruction, if any.

indicativeRate.description: The indicative rate at the time of submitting a payment initiation request. Actual rate with which the payment will be processed will be calculated/ fetched during payment processing.

chargeAccountId.description: Indicates the account to which the charges has to be levied. Used when charges are to be taken from a separate account

chargeAccountCurrencyId.description: When a charge account is specified, this field indicates the currency of the charge account

creditValueDate.description: Reference quoted by the credit account for a payment

PSDCompliant.description: Defines whether the transaction is PSD (Payment Services Directive) compliant or not.

totalDebitAmount.description: The total debit amount including the charges associated for the payment

localInstrumentCode.description: List of transfer type has been mentioned locally in a record

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeName.description: The description of the charge to be taken for payment

chargeCurrencyId.description: Specifies the currency of the charge amount. Allowed only when a charge amount is specified

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

orderingPortfolio.description: Indicates the portfolio id for the debit side if the account belongs to a specific portfolio

creditPortfolio.description: Indicates the portfolio id for the credit side if the account belongs to a specific portfolio

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

beneficiaryBankClearingCode.description: Clearing code or sort code of the beneficiary bank

accountWithBankClearingCode.description: This is the national clearing code or sort code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

clearingChannel.description: Indicates the clearing channel for the payment in the ISO format of the Clearing System Identifiers

structuredCreditorReference.description: Contains description of the credit account reference

signatory.description: The authorised signatories for the payments can be specified here. More applicable in case of corporate payments where multiple signatories are required to sign a payment instruction

purpose.description: Purpose identifier of the payment or transaction, for SEPA payments in general.

structuredCommunicationCode.description: Creditor reference in a coded form i.e - RADM (RemittanceAdviceMessage) - RPIN (RelatedPaymentInstruction) - FXDR (ForeignExchangeDealReference) - DISP (DispatchAdvice) - PUOR (PurchaseOrder) - SCOR (StructuredCommunicationReference)

endToEndReference.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

instructionIdReference.description: Indicates the SEPA purpose of the SEPA Payment

termsAndConditions.description: Specifies the terms and conditions in the text format for the payment instruction, if any.

paymentStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

currentStatus.description: This indicates the current status of payment order

internalStatus.description: This indicates a full description of payment purpose code. i.e. purpose of the instruction based on a set of pre-defined categories.

systemId.description: The system application identifier from which the entry was generated

indicativeRate.description: The indicative rate at the time of submitting a payment initiation request. Actual rate with which the payment will be processed will be calculated/ fetched during payment processing.

PSDCompliant.description: Defines whether the transaction is PSD (Payment Services Directive) compliant or not.

GPIStatus.description: This field to store the GPI status as received in gpi confirmation tracker

GPICreditValueDate.description: Field store the date and time when the credit confirmation received

beneficiaryName.description: Short title or short name of the beneficiary account account

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

paymentOrderPurposeCodeId.description: Indicates the Id of payment purpose code i.e. purpose of the instruction based on a set of pre-defined categories.

displayName.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

classification.description: This indicates a high-level classification of payment purpose code. i.e. purpose of the instruction based on a set of pre-defined categories.

definition.description: This indicates a full description of payment purpose code. i.e. purpose of the instruction based on a set of pre-defined categories.

paymentProductGroupId.description: Payment method group details of the payment

countryIds.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

countryId.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

clearingChannelId.description: Clearing channel id details for the order

additionalInformations.description: Additional Information provided to add context

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

paymentOrderProductId.description: Indicates the payment order product for which payment is initiated

displayName.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

rank.description: Indicates the rank of the payment order product within the group.

payThroughBeneficiary.description: Defines whether payment initiation can be done by providing beneficiary details. This is applicable when beneficiary is not within the same bank

futureDate.description: Indicates if a future dated instruction can be inputted for the specific payment order product

requiredCreditValue.description: Indicates if required credit value date can be inputted for the specific payment order product while initiating a payment

IBANSupport.description: Check for payment support for IBAN or not

BICSupport.description: Check for payment support for BIC or not

sortCodeSupport.description: Check for payment support for sortCode or not

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

weblink.description: The web link for additional information

forexSupport.description: Check for payment support for forex or not

defaultChargeOption.description: Indicates the charge option which will be defaulted at the time of payment initiation for specific payment order product i.e. Recipient To Pay All Charges, Pay My Bank's Charges or Pay My Bank Charges Only.

checkTransparency.description: Used to set if simulation is required or not

awaitExternalSubmit.description: External payment request for approval details

clearingChannelId.description: Clearing channel id details for the order

countryId.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

displayName.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

IBANSupport.description: Check for payment support for IBAN or not

BICSupport.description: Check for payment support for BIC or not

sortCodeSupport.description: Check for payment support for sortCode or not

narratives.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

contextName.description: Field name returned by the payment engine (TPH) for information or further processing.

contextValue.description: Field value returned by the payment engine (TPH) for information or further processing.

charges.description: The charges or fees for this transaction

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the Charge Amount after redeem

chargeCurrencyId.description: Specifies the currency of the charge amount. Allowed only when a charge amount is specified

paymentOrderProductId.description: Indicates the payment order product for which payment is initiated

debitAccountIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the debtor account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

beneficiaryIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

consent.description: This field indicates if Ordering customer has provided consent for this payment order to be initiated

beneficiaryName.description: Short title or short name of the beneficiary account account

endToEndReference.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

purpose.description: Purpose identifier of the payment or transaction, for SEPA payments in general.

chargeBearer.description: Bearer of the charges of the order. For example: BEN(All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR(All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA(Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

internalStatus.description: This indicates a full description of payment purpose code. i.e. purpose of the instruction based on a set of pre-defined categories.
This indicates a full description of payment purpose code. i.e. purpose of the instruction based on a set of pre-defined categories.

displayName.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

swiftPrefix.description: Prefix of country specific details in payments method

UETRId.description: Unique transaction reference details for payments
Unique transaction reference details for payments

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

endToEndReference.description: Indicates the end to end reference for the payment. This field can be provided by the person who instructs the payment and this flows through the lifecycle of the payment.

paymentDirection.description: Indicates the direction of payment i.e. incoming, outgoing, book or redirect

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

instructedAmount.description: Specifies the amount which is allocated or instructed for the account reference included in the selection for a specific transaction.

initiationTime.description: Initiation of the payment time details

finalChargeAmount.description: Total amount details of payment inclusive of charges

overallStatusCode.description: Overall status code details of the payment

partyCreationTime.description: Debtor creation time details of the payment

partySendersReferenceOutgoing.description: Debtor payment reference details of outgoing

partySendersReferenceIncoming.description: Debtor payment reference details of incoming

beneficiaryReceivedDateTime.description: Creditor payment received date time details

beneficiaryTotalDuration.description: Payment total duration details for receiver

creditValueDate.description: Reference quoted by the credit account for a payment

displayName.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

GPIStatus.description: This field to store the GPI status as received in gpi confirmation tracker

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.
